name: V-CUBE USA
overview:
V-CUBE USA provides visual web-based communication solutions for companies, universities, governments agencies to meet todays fast paced global community.

V-cube’s visual communications platform connects participants from around the world to talk, see, exchange ideas and share files in real-time. Today, through V-cube’s groundbreaking technology and our team of consultants, we help our clients connect globally from the comfort of their home or office PC.

We want the world connected without the worries of costs. Today’s economy has built higher walls and distance between business. Companies must adapt, adopt and apply the worlds growing technology. V-cube has built and engineered platforms that are cost effective, easy to use and pain free to all. We believe in the future of breaking down barriers to connect professionals and students from any location.

We have successfully integrated high quality web based video and audio communication using standard web-camera’s and headset’s. The platform was designed to meet the needs of the business community by integrating numerous features for effective and efficient conferences. We’ve helped 1,000’s of companies save millions of $US dollars by allowing them to cut back on short and long distance travel costs, toll charges, printing costs, onsite training, document storage and much much more. Our success, is the design for a user friendly service that gives everyone the opportunity to take advantage of V-cube. Join us, as we unite the world through our web based visual communications platform.

Start using V-cube Today.
